title: American Express Releases Redesigned iPhone and Android Mobile AppTravelandtourworld.com
text:
American Express redesigns app for unique mobile service features Published on : Friday, July 10, 2015
American Express announced the redesigned U.S. Amex Mobile app for iPhone and Android. Available for Personal, Small Business and Corporate Card Members, the redesigned app includes the convenience of Touch ID™ login, nearby offers on a map, rewards information and unique mobile service features like on-the-spot fraud alert verification.
The updated features and modern design allow users to make the most of their American Express Membership. The app not only makes it simple to pay your bill on the go, but also provides value to our Card Members with a broad set of features:
Sign in faster with Touch ID for supported devices with iOS 8+ Stay on top of spending: View payment status when you log in Access real time transaction activity (pending and posted charges) in a timeline Access Benefits and Rewards: View Card benefits and Membership Reward® balances Use Membership Rewards points for eligible charges in the app. Terms apply. Discover nearby Amex Offers for shopping, dining and travel Get instant fraud alerts and verify charges right in the app
“Mobile allows us to deepen our relationship with Card Members by helping them better access the benefits, rewards and security they get with American Express. With the redesigned platform, we’re just getting started to make all the amazing services we offer our Card Members come alive in mobile,” said David Yoo, Senior Vice President, Mobile Products and Services.
Listening to customer needs is top-of-mind for American Express. iPhone users requested Touch ID, and in December 2014 American Express became one of the first US financial services companies to offer this feature. The redesigned app also brings our iPhone and Android users’ needs front and center. The user experience is now native to each operating system, including iPhone 6 and 6 Plus optimization, and brings Amex Offers to the Android platform. Now, Card Member services, benefits, and offers are just a few taps away.
Card Members can download the latest app from the App StoreSM and the Google Play™ store. Card Members can also text AMEXMOBILE to 86509 to receive a link to download on their iPhone running iOS 7.0+ or Android phone running 4.3+. Message and data rates may apply.
